title: Define project scope and requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the LiteraryGenomeEditor, including the desired features, user stories, use cases, and non-functional requirements (e.g., performance, scalability, security, and maintainability). Identify potential risks and constraints.

title: Design system architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the main components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Design user interface
description: Design the user interface for the LiteraryGenomeEditor, including wireframes, mockups, and prototypes.

title: Develop text processing and manipulation engine
description: Implement the core text processing and manipulation engine that allows for splicing and combining different literary elements.

title: Implement user interface
description: Develop the user interface based on the approved designs, ensuring a smooth and intuitive experience for authors.
dependencies: Develop text processing and manipulation engine

title: Set up database and data storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for storing literary works, user data, and other relevant information.

title: Implement security measures
description: Ensure the application is secure by implementing appropriate security measures, such as user authentication, data encryption, and input validation.

title: Set up continuous integration and deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the application.

title: Write user documentation
description: Create comprehensive user documentation, including guides, tutorials, and FAQs, to help authors effectively use the LiteraryGenomeEditor.

title: Conduct testing and quality assurance
description: Plan and execute a thorough testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the application meets the defined requirements and quality standards.
dependencies: Develop text processing and manipulation engine
Set up database and data storage
